description.originalText: Caro was an incredible help to us last Summer when our childcare plans for my 1-year-old suddenly fell through. They worked with us several times a week for two months until the school year began and it was a great experience for our family. Both my baby and my 3-year-old loved Caro's energy, playfulness, and kindness. They were extremely conscientious and communicative, and we always felt comfortable knowing Caro could handle any challenge that came up and keep us fully informed if needed. (Especially during some of my toddler's most temperamental spells!) We highly recommend them as a trusted caregiver for your little ones.

description.displayText:
Caro was a huge help during this difficult time. Having both kids (3yrs and 9months) at home while working was tough. Caro helped me tremendously, not just with the kids, but also cleaning up after playtime and meals. She was very resourceful to keep both kids happy and entertained. She always brought new ideas and materials to be creative. Caro was always punctual and a great communicator. 
I would definitely hire Caro again and can only recommend her for anybody who needs help with their kids any age. 

Thank you Caro!

description.displayText: I don't have enough good things to say about Caro, who has babysat for us regularly for two years. She was a counselor to my 7 year old at camp in the Middlesex Fells, and they became such good buddies, that more time together was required. Caro is always loads of fun--having her is a high point for both my girls. She does wonderful crafts, encourages creativity of all sorts, loves imaginative play, music, and reading. She's amazing at coming up with fun activities outside and inside, though she has a special love of nature. My kids can be a little competitive, especially with a favorites babysitter, and Caro does a marvelous job of making them both feel special. I absolutely trust her to keep order and make sure that the kids are polite, respectful, fed, clothed, etc. More importantly, I can tell she really cares for them and, indeed, for all kids. She's the perfect combination of a babysitter parents can rely upon and one that kids will adore.

description.displayText: Caroline babysat for my son and she has since become an all time favorite! Caroline is full of positive energy and was up for anything my son wanted to do (there was a lot of imaginary play involved in their days together and she was always up for it:). She was always punctual and extremely responsible. I highly recommend Caroline!
